name: Save tray config in Memory
Init flow Variables
Save Settings to File
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(global.get('tray'),null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty};

name: Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Setup Read ModBus
Publish tray
Save config file
Continue Tray readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',false)
return msg;

name: Archive Pulse
Allow Readings
Save flow env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Get pm2Name
func:
msg.payload = global.get("pm2Name");
return msg;

name: Single Archive Pulse
func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: Save global env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Pause Readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',true)
return msg;

name: Publish tray
Init Gizmo
Create Setting
Create Readings
Readings Alarm Scan
Alarm changed
Check Modbus Setting
Simulation Mode
func:
global.set('simMode',Number(msg.payload));
return msg;

name: Sim RF button
Forward Power
Reverse Power
Sim Power button
Sim RF off
reset alarm
func:
msg.payload = { value: 0, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 4 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

name: reset all
func:
msg.payload = { value: 0, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 5 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;
